about.description_1: Experienced Frontend Developer with 4+ years of experience in designing and implementing web applications. Proven track record of delivering successful projects that enhance user experience through high-quality, efficient code and improved application performance.
about.description_2: Experienced in direct client communication, architecture contribution, and delivering user-centric solutions.
about.description_3: Ready to leverage my expertise to contribute to innovative solutions in a dynamic environment.

education.btechTitle: Bachelor of Technology, Computer Science & Engineering (CSE)
education.btechFrom: Guru Gobind Singh Indraprastha University (GGSIPU), Delhi

ariaLabelList: interactive project media app using AR github link
projects.portfolioDesc: Designed and developed a personal portfolio website to showcase projects and skills, without frameworks. Focused on creating a lightweight, responsive and user-friendly experience.
projects.portfolioTech: HTML5, CSS, JavaScript, Visual Studio Code, Git
projects.quizNewsAppDesc: A multi feature application offering Quizzes on 24 different topics with 3 levels, results, and offline. Quotes (Go-Quotes API) and News features like headlines, search, detailed articles.
projects.quizNewsAppTech: Java, XML, Android Studio, SQLite DB, Retrofit2 Library, Picasso Library
projects.printMediaAppTitle: Interactive Print Media Application using Augmented Reality (AR)
projects.printMediaAppDesc: An AR mobile app that displays related video on the scanned photo / article, allowing videos to appear as they replace the photos.
projects.printMediaAppTech: Unity, Vuforia Engine, Vuforia Database, Android SDK, VuMark, VS Code and Adobe Illustrator

experience.capgroleAndResponsibilites_1: Worked on multiple projects for a global retail client, delivering solutions used by over 1,500 stores worldwide.
experience.capgroleAndResponsibilites_2: Designed and developed responsive frontend screens end-to-end — from requirement gathering to production release.
experience.capgroleAndResponsibilites_3: Ensured seamless user experience across desktop, tablet, and mobile platforms with internationalization (i18n) support.
experience.capgroleAndResponsibilites_4: Built reusable components, reducing development time for new features by 40%.
experience.capgroleAndResponsibilites_5: Diagnosed and resolved critical issues, reducing production incidents by 75% through code optimization.
experience.capgroleAndResponsibilites_6: Participated in architecture discussions to enhance application design, functionality, and technical strategies.
experience.capgroleAndResponsibilites_7: Collaborated with cross-functional teams to gather requirements and deliver innovative frontend solutions.
experience.capgroleAndResponsibilites_8: Contributed to both frontend and backend development during the initial project phases.
experience.capgadditionalResponsibilities_1: Led the development team, ensuring timely delivery of high-quality deliverables.
experience.capgadditionalResponsibilities_2: Managed weekly client communications for project status updates, requirement discussions, and product demonstrations.
experience.capgadditionalResponsibilities_3: Conducted code reviews and mentored over 10 junior developers, emphasizing code quality and adherence to standards.
